rows.label: qst101602_msg0001
rows.name:
Aah!! I, the treasure hunter
Erebos, was supposed to
decipher that first!!

rows.label: qst101602_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh... You're the Driver
party that found my knife!

rows.label: qst101602_msg0003
rows.name:
Thanks to my lucky knife
returning, I was able to
understand the meaning of this mural!

rows.label: qst101602_msg0004
rows.name:
It seems to indicate the
location of treasure hidden
by the ancient Nopon tribe.

rows.label: qst101602_msg0005
rows.name:
There must be something in
the 'hermit's belly'...

rows.label: qst101602_msg0006
rows.name:
What are you talking about?
I'm a treasure hunter.

rows.label: qst101602_msg0007
rows.name: I'll find the treasure before you do!

rows.label: qst101602_msg0009
rows.name:
'One is in the hermit's belly.'...
Hmm... What does that mean...?
